snippet.title: Forsake The Rake
snippet.description:
Help Poison Games work more efficiently, check this link https://gogetfunding.com/one-cup-of-coffee-so-i-can-work-more-easily/ Thanks

Android Download Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PoisonGames.ForsakeTheRake
PC Download Link: http://gamejolt.com/games/ForsakeTheRake/236476

You and Your friend are on a quest to find the truth about The Rake. Investigation took you to the forest where is a secret underground lab.

Search the abandoned underground lab and find the truth about the Rake!

Features:

- 10 Levels to play
- Known Poison Games Gameplay
- Good 3D Graphics
- Horrifying full 3D The Rake monster!
- Good Smooth Controls

The story about The Rake STARTS HERE...
